content: the modena court has issued a final ruling in a civil case regarding the dissolution of a community inheritance the court has declared the dissolution and awarded equal parts of the hereditary property to the parties involved the total value of the property is €1200000 with an excess amount of €400000 after deducting expenses and legal fees the net balance is €107656 the court has ordered the payment of the remaining amount to a specific bank and initiated an executive procedure for the distribution of the determined share the court has also ordered the cancellation of judicial mortgages and other related land registry fulfillments any claims have been rejected and the parties have been fully compensated for the costs of the proceedings the legal principles applied were based on the italian constitution and civil code the courtappointed technical consultant determined the value of the property the court considered the duration of the case and unsuccessful attempts to sell the property before deciding to allocate the entire estate to the requesting parties the value of the property was determined based on expert reports and recent jurisprudence the court has ordered the dissolution of the community inheritance and the allocation of the property to the parties involved after deducting expenses the remaining amount is to be paid to the joint owners the court has also addressed the costs incurred in the case including the expenses of the technical consultant and legal fees which are to be borne by the parties involved the ruling was made on april 1 2019
